title: An Arundel Tomb interaction with Time

content.question: Lines 32-42 (“Now, helpless . . . love”) suggest which of the following about the relationship between “Time” and the couple depicted on the tomb?

choices.label: The forces of time transform the couple into an abstract representation of love.
The forces of time expose the untruthful nature of the couple at the time of their deaths.
The forces of time gradually erase the meaning of the couple’s titles and coat of arms.
The couple has come to represent the forces of time to modern viewers who do not know their history.

content.answer: The forces of time transform the couple into an abstract representation of love.

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
